name: ASDM
body:
# Introduction
The AnticipatoRy System Dynamics Networks (ASDM) library is a genetic algorithm
system for automatically generating system dynamics
models that differ in both their embedded parameters and their fundamental
equations while maintaining dimensional consistency. It is intended to be
used for anticipatory modeling of systems such as complex networks. A
reference for the ASDM API can be found
[here](http://drmichaelnorth.github.io/ASDM/docs).

# Authors
ARCANE was developed by [Michael J. North](https://www.linkedin.com/in/drmichaelnorth">), Pam Sydelko, and Ignacio Martinez-Moyano at [Argonne National Laboratory](https://www.anl.gov).
